About Monterey Bay Door

Family-owned commercial access control specialists serving Central California since 2007

Building on 30+ Years of Construction Excellence

Monterey Bay Door was founded in 2007 as the specialized supply division of Stately Construction, a family-owned construction company serving Central California since the early 1990s. What started as a way to ensure reliable door hardware and access control systems for our own construction projects has evolved into Monterey Bay's premier commercial access control specialist.

Located in Hollister, California, we've built our reputation by handling the complex access control needs of hotels, colleges, and major commercial buildings throughout the Central Coast. When you're managing access for hundreds of hotel rooms or thousands of college students, reliability isn't optional—it's everything.

Family Business, Enterprise Capabilities

Tommy serves as General Manager and will be taking over the business from his father-in-law over the next two years, ensuring the family tradition of quality service continues. Our team combines decades of construction experience with specialized expertise in modern access control technologies.

We're proud to be the local experts who understand your business while maintaining the vendor relationships and technical capabilities typically found only with large national suppliers.

What Makes Us Different

Direct Vendor Partnerships

Better Pricing, Better Support

Unlike distributors and resellers, we maintain direct relationships with major manufacturers like Allegion and other industry leaders. This means competitive pricing for our customers, faster product availability, and direct access to technical support when you need it.

Full-Service Approach

One Partner, Complete Solution

We don't just sell hardware—we provide complete solutions. From initial consultation and system design through installation, training, and ongoing maintenance, we handle every aspect of your commercial access control needs.

Proven Project Experience

Trusted by Major Commercial Clients

Our portfolio includes hotels requiring complex master key systems, colleges managing thousands of student credentials, and commercial buildings with sophisticated visitor management needs. We understand the unique challenges of large-scale access control projects.

Local Presence with Enterprise Standards

Responsive Service, Professional Results

Being based in Hollister means we can respond quickly when you need us, whether for emergency service calls or project consultations. But our standards and capabilities match what you'd expect from national providers.

Our Expertise

Access Control Systems

Professional Design and Installation

  • Card reader systems and mobile credentials
  • Control panels and software integration
  • Visitor management and temporary access
  • Multi-site management and reporting

Commercial Door Hardware

Complete Hardware Solutions

  • Exit devices and panic hardware
  • Commercial locksets and cylinders
  • Door closers and automatic operators
  • Hinges, pivots, and accessories

Service and Maintenance

Keeping Your Systems Running

  • Preventive maintenance contracts
  • Emergency repair services
  • System updates and expansions
  • User training and support

The Team

Tommy - General Manager

30+ years in construction and access control

Tommy leads our day-to-day operations and brings decades of experience in both construction and specialized access control systems. He's the person you'll work with on major projects, ensuring everything from initial specification through final training meets your exact requirements.

Technical Specialist - Technical Lead

Professional installation and project documentation

Our technical specialist handles complex system installations and also serves as our project photographer, documenting installations for case studies and ensuring we have complete project records for future service needs.

The Stately Construction Connection

Construction expertise when you need it

As the sister company to Stately Construction, we can coordinate with broader construction and renovation projects, ensuring your access control systems integrate seamlessly with your building plans.

Our Commitment

Quality Assurance

Every installation meets manufacturer specifications and industry standards. We stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties and ongoing support.

Responsive Service

Located in Hollister with service throughout Central California. Same-day response for emergency service calls, 24-hour turnaround for commercial quotes.

Competitive Pricing

Direct vendor relationships and efficient operations mean competitive pricing without sacrificing quality or service.

Long-term Partnerships

We're not just installing systems—we're building relationships. Many of our clients have been with us for years, trusting us with expansions, upgrades, and ongoing maintenance.

Ready to discuss your project?

We'd love to learn about your access control needs and show you how our experience and vendor relationships can benefit your project.
